Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Relates to preventing certain elected officials from being a member of an agency or industrial development authority; repealer
Summary: Prevents certain elected officials from being a member of an agency or industrial development authority.
LawCode: Rpld §856 sub 4, amd §856, Gen Muni L; amd §§1952 & 2304, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the public authorities law, in relation to preventing certain elected officials from being a member of an agency or industrial development authority; and to repeal subdivision 4 of section 856 of the general municipal law relating thereto
